DB.ConStr: workstation id=sqlscm;packet size=4096;user id=username;data source=server;persist security info=False;initial catalog=DB;password=pwd
DB.GetCommand: select Name,object_definition(object_id) AS Body, type AS DBType from sys.objects WHERE (type = 'P' OR type = 'FN') AND modify_date>=@ADate
DB.FullGetCommand: select Name,object_definition(object_id) AS Body, type AS DBType from sys.objects WHERE (type = 'P' OR type = 'FN')
DB.GetAllObjects2FileCommand: SELECT name,xtype,crdate FROM sysobjects WITH (nolock) WHERE xtype IN ('U','P','FN','V','TF') ORDER BY xtype,name
DB.GetGrants: select  princ.name,princ.type_desc,perm.permission_name,perm.state_desc,perm.class_desc,object_name(perm.major_id) AS objectName from sys.database_principals princ left join sys.database_permissions perm on      perm.grantee_principal_id = princ.principal_id
